description: On September 5, a research team from the United States revealed in the journal Science that it had achieved a groundbreaking advance in biomedical imaging. By applying a yellow dye known as tartrazine directly to the skin of rodents, the team succeeded in visualizing internal structures with unprecedented clarity.
title: After the invisible man, the (partially) transparent mouse

description: A complete, non-impact sport, swimming is beneficial for both prevention and existing chronic illnesses. It can be practiced at any age, as numerous studies have shown.
title: Swimming, a golden activity for your health
